2. MOSEK

The gap functions of all problems are evaluated thanks to the MOSEK software
(http://www.mosek.com/).  
MOSEK is necessary for running the code if the accuracy in terms of gap functions 
needs to be evaluated. 

3. Reference

Chen, Yunmei, Guanghui Lan, and Yuyuan Ouyang,
Accelerated Schemes For A Class of Variational Inequalities,
arXiv preprint arXiv:1403.4164 (2014)
description: Matlab code for the accelerated mirror-prox (AMP) algorithm
